title: The Promise of Two
description: [Siren Ménage Everlasting: Erotic Ménage a Trois Romance, M/F/M, HEA]Jill has known CJ and Vernon most of her life but is just admitting her attraction to them. Will it ruin their friendship, though? The men have loved her for a long time and are intent on convincing her to take the chance at a dream come true. When a storm takes out her bedroom, they realize they could have lost her and make it their goal to make her their wife.Can Jill put the fear out of her mind that she will come between them and lose their friendship forever? Or will she screw up a chance at a lifetime of love and devotion from the two men who mean more to her than anything?Vernon and CJ have until the repairs on her house are complete to convince her of their determination to make her theirs.Will she trust that they can share or lose out on the promise of two?*APP Exclusive
author: Marla Monroe
